Welcome to Hilltop Carvings & Primitives

Our products include hand crafted, folk art carvings of Santa Claus, and reproductions of antique wall boxes. Each santa has a lightly aged finish, and all wall decor are rustic in design. Individually or together they make excellent gifts, decorations, and accent pieces.

Gallery

Visit Hill Top Carvings & Primatives

We are open by chance or appointment. Call or email ahead to be sure we are open.
